reference.title: Top Consumers
reference.shortdesc: Find out which classes, class loaders and packages are using the most memory.

section.title: Motivation
section.p: This shows the important components which are using the most memory.

strow.stentry: Set of objects to include in the analysis.
Threshold (in percent of the total heap size) which objects have to exceed to be included in the analysis.
